---
id: make-default
title: "Make a Model Default"
description: "Sets a model as the default model — when prompts are sent without a Model ID, the default model is used."

custom_edit_url: null
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Make a Model Default"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/model-svc/model/{modelId}/make-default"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Sets a model as the default model — when prompts are sent without a Model ID, the default model is used.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Model ID","in":"path","name":"modelId","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","title":"model_svc.MakeDefaultResponse"}}},"description":"OK"},"400":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"model_svc.ErrorResponse"}}},"description":"Invalid Model ID"},"401":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"model_svc.ErrorResponse"}}},"description":"Unauthorized"},"500":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"model_svc.ErrorResponse"}}},"description":"Internal Server Error"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
